cab.content: SECRET.OPERATIONS *From; General Plumer, Italy. To: C.I.G.S.,War Office.Despatched 10.15 p.m. 11.12*17. Received 3 a.m. 12.12.17.0*116. December 11th.There has been a marked general increase in the activity of enemy1s artillery today. Both our sector and the French have been continually bombarded0 Our Artillery have carried out some successful counter-battery work, two enerny aeroplanes destroyed yesterday. Enemy attacked Col* Berretta this morning; they captured a few advanced trenches at first but later were repulsed except at the peak. Italian counter-attacks were to be delivered this afternoon.
